get.summary: This endpoint searches for a subset of entities from all entities filtered by specified parameters returning the entity set in the format specified.

parameters.description:
Search for entity with geometries intersected by a point constructed with this longitude.
        Requires latitude to be provided.

Search for entity with geometries intersected by a point constructed with this longitude.
        Requires latitude to be provided.

Search for entities with geometries intersected by a point constructed with this latitude.
        Requires longitude to be provided.

schema.title: Latitude
schema.description:
Search for entities with geometries intersected by a point constructed with this latitude.
        Requires longitude to be provided.

parameters.name: latitude

get.summary: This endpoint lists all datasets, returning the results in the file format specified.
This endpoint returns a specific dataset in the file format specified.

schema.title: Dataset

parameters.name: dataset
